item.title: [Python] Made a Chrome extension to drive out dark sites from the world with the power of natural language processing
item.description: #Motivation Coronavirus pandemic is all the dark news these days… :pensive: â†’If you only see the bright news, you will feel positive! Made A Chrome extension that makes Google search results less visible as the content is darker. Chrome Store: Opty github Actual screen Dark site Bright site How to use Just install the Chrome extension from here and search!
